Otherwise, awes...Full ReviewI started playing this game on my previous phone (Lumia 710) and your version is my favorite. The only thing which I dislike is that the color scheme is different. The game would be even more awesome if you add an option to change the color schemes (adding the one for windows phone). Otherwise, awesome game!
